articles.title: Kim Yong Chun Meets Chinese Military Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Chun Meets Chinese Military Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Tuesday met and had a talk with the delegation of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army headed by Lieut. General Zhang Youxia, commander of the area.

articles.title: Gift from Chinese Military Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Chinese Military Delegation
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the delegation of the Shenyang Military Area of the Chinese People's Liberation Army headed by Lieut. General Zhang Youxia, commander of the area, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to Vice-Marshal of the Korean People's Army Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by the head of the delegation on Tuesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Trinidad and Tobago
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Trinidad and Tobago 
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to George Maxwell Richard, President of Trinidad and Tobago, on Tuesday on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message wholeheartedly wished the friendly people of Trinidad and Tobago progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Libyan Leader
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Libyan Leader
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Moammer el Gaddafi, leader of the revolution of the Great Socialist People's Libyan Arab Jamahiriya, on the occasion of the 41st anniversary of the Great September First Revolution in Libya.
					 Kim in the message sincerely hoped that the Libyan leader will always enjoy good health and happiness and the Libyan people register greater successes in their efforts to protect the country's sovereignty and achieve economic prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Kyrgyz President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Kyrgyz President
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Roza Otunbayeva, President of Kirgizstan, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop and wished the Kyrgyz president success in her work for the country's stability and people's welfare.

articles.title: Anniversary of Socialist Republic of Vietnam Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Socialist Republic of Vietnam Observed
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A film show took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to mark the 65th founding anniversary of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were Le Van Cu, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 On hand were Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 The participants watched a Korean documentary film "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Jong Il Meets General Secretary Nong Duc Manh of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam." Nong Duc Manh visited the DPRK from October 16 to 18, Juche 96 (2007). The film has historic scenes telling that Kim Jong Il made an immortal contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Vietnam through his energetic external activities.
					
					 Then a friendly meeting was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club.
					
					 The participants talked to one another about the need to boost the bilateral relations and had sports and amusement games.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Leadership at Kim Il Sung University Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Leadership at Kim Il Sung University Marked
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday to commemorate the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of immortal leadership at Kim Il Sung University.
					 It was attended by Kim Yong Nam, Choe Thae Bok and other senior officials, officials concerned, officials of ministries and national institutions, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and those of party cadre-training institutions, teachers and students and graduates of the university and officials in the field of education in the city.
					
					 Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University who doubles as minister of Higher Education, recalled in his report that Kim Jong Il started his dynamic leadership at the university on September 1, Juche 49 (1960) with his noble will to glorify Korea, adding that this marked a landmark event in carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il climbed Ryongnam Hill and made a historic pledge to glorify Korea, prompted by his noble aim to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung, generation after generation.
					
					 Since the day Kim Jong Il energetically conducted revolutionary activities, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 Conducting the revolutionary activities at the university Kim Jong Il further developed in depth the Juche idea and the Songun idea of the President with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and revolutionary practices.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, deeply considerate of education and scientific researches of the university, directed big efforts to strengthening the university into the central base of training the successors to the revolutionary cause of Juche and a powerful center for the development of the nation's science and technology.
					
					 Today the university is shining with the revolutionary relics of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and training huge contingents of national cadres capable of playing the pivotal role in education and science and various fields of politics, economy and culture.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need to put the education and science of the university on the world level and qualitatively train many more competent revolutionary personnel who would make positive contribution to building a thriving nation and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Art Performance Given at Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Art Performance Given at Kim Il Sung University
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by art squad of students and teachers of Kim Il Sung University at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the immortal leadership at the university.
					 It was appreciated by senior party and state officials, officials of ministries and national institutions, officials concerned and teachers, students and graduates of the university.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the undying feats the peerlessly great man performed by bringing about a fresh surge in all domains of the revolution and construction and opening a new history for achieving the cause of Juche through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and dynamic practices.
					
					 Oungum ensemble "He Will Surely Come", story-telling and song "Let's Sing of Swimming Pool Associated with Loving Care" and other numbers dealt with touching stories about the indefatigable leadership provided by Kim Jong Il for developing the university into a university of President Kim Il Sung and the Workers' Party of Korea and the highest seat of Juche-based education and science, in name and reality, and the profound loving care shown by him.
					
					 Also put on the stage were such numbers as chorus and story-telling "Socialism Is Ours", drum beating and song "For the Revolution", comic story "Let's Do Tomorrow", poem and chorus "Push Back the Frontiers of Latest Science and Technology" representing the ideological and moral world and life of the students in the era of Songun.

articles.title: New Power Station Goes Operational
articles.content:
New Power Station Goes Operational
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Ryesonggang Power Station No. 6 went operational with due ceremony in the DPRK  on Tuesday.
					 The completion of the power station made it possible to boost the electricity production for the development of the nation's economy and the improvement of the standard of people's living. 
					
					 Officials, builders and members of the shock brigade in Paechon County, South Hwanghae Province, successfully completed the construction of the power station in a matter of little over one year.

articles.title: Sariwon Stadium Successfully Reconstructed
articles.content:
Sariwon Stadium Successfully Reconstructed
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Sariwon Stadium underwent successful reconstruction. Its completion ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					 The stadium with the accommodation capacity of more than 20,000 people is fully equipped with all conditions necessary for indoor and outdoor games and training of diverse events including football, basketball, volleyball, track-and-field events, table tennis, lawn tennis, badminton, weight-lifting, Taekwon-do, boxing and wrestling. 
					
					 The reconstruction of the stadium made it possible for sportspersons, working people and school youth and children to improve their sports technique there. The stadium can also satisfactorily host domestic and international games, to say nothing of colorful sports and cultural activities including mass gymnastic display.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Ri Sang Gwan, chairman of the North Hwanghae Provincial People's Committee, officials of units at all levels, builders and working people.
					
					A message of thanks sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il was conveyed to the builders and helpers who participated in the project for the reconstruction of the stadium.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the stadium.

articles.title: New Chairman of GFTUK Committee Elected
articles.content:
New Chairman of GFTUK Committee Elected
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The 65th Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea took place in Pyongyang Tuesday.
					 The meeting relieved Chairman Kim Pyong Phal of his post for a health reason and elected Hyon Sang Ju chairman of the GFTUK Central Committee.

articles.title: First International Volleyball Referee
articles.content:
First International Volleyball Referee
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Jang Jong Hyang, a women's volleyball coach of the Pyongyang Sports Team, has become the first FIVB (International Volleyball Federation) referee of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 She, 38, succeeded in the qualification examination of the refereeing delegation of the Asian Women's Club Volleyball Championship held in Indonesia from late June to early July.
					
					 Earlier, she passed the candidate course held in May Juche 98 (2009).
					
					 She began playing volleyball in her secondary school days and attracted experts' attention as an up-and-coming volleyballer in her teens.
					
					 After graduating from Korea University of Physical Education, she became a coach. With rich experience and knowledge of foreign languages, she had been chosen as a candidate for international referee.
					
					 Her refereeing ability has already been proved in domestic tournaments.

articles.title: 3rd Joint Academic Symposium Held
articles.content:
3rd Joint Academic Symposium Held
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The 3rd joint academic symposium of the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK and the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan was held at the People's Palace of Culture Tuesday.
					 Present there were officials and researchers of the academy and the delegation of the association.
					
					 It was addressed by Kim Jong Yong, vice-president of the academy, and Kim Hwa Hyo, chairman of the association who is heading the delegation.
					
					 They were followed by speeches on such subjects as "On main contents modified and supplemented to the Socialist Constitution of the DPRK", "On the drive to build an economic power in our country at present", "Tendency of studying socialist economy overseas", etc.
					
					 Panel academic round-table talks were held there.

articles.title: Production Capacity More than Trebles at Cornstarch Factory
articles.content:
Production Capacity More than Trebles at Cornstarch Factory 
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory underwent successful technological updating in a short span of time. As a result, all confectionary production processes were put on a CNC basis and the production capacity more than trebled to mass-produce confectionary. 
					 All the production processes ranging from the feeding of raw materials to packing are computerized to streamline the production of sweets and biscuits.
					
					  The factory has a series of streamlined production processes based on a combined computer control system and is furnished with modern equipment developed and manufactured by its own efforts and with indigenous technology. This has brought about a signal boost in the production of confectionary including drops and varieties of biscuits.
					
					  Quality and weight of varieties of products and operation of equipment and all other production processes are monitored and controlled at the combined control room. 
					
					 As all the processes and machines have been put under the double or treble automatic control systems, most stable production is ensured and labor productivity markedly rose. 
					
					 Anion generating devices and air quarantine equipment are installed at the work sites to thoroughly ensure the germ-free production.
					
					 The factory is now busy delivering confectionary to commercial units.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Undisguised Moves to Grab Tok Islets Flayed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Undisguised Moves to Grab Tok Islets Flayed
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Materials proving the fact that Tok Islets are part of an inalienable territory of Korea were recently disclosed again to bring into bolder relief the brigandish and shameless ambition of Japan to grab the islets, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Jong Pyong Jun, professor at Ehwa Women's University of south Korea, said in his book "Tok Islets in 1947" that "the U.S. map in 1949 and the UK map in 1951 were produced without having mutual consultation, but both sides marked Tok Islets as part of the territory of Korea." 
					
					 One of the disclosed maps was the map made by the U.S. State Department when preparing a "draft peace treaty with Japan" and the other was the map produced by the UK two years later.
					
					 It is the fact recognized by those who have elementary common sense and viewpoint that Tok Islets are part of the inviolable territory of Korea. This admits of no argument. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries are becoming all the more undisguised in their bid to seize Tok Islets.
					
					 The aim sought by Japan in shamelessly raising the claim to Tok Islets is to pick up the sensitive territorial issue in a bid to kick off the reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 Japan is making desperate efforts to realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" by invading Korea and conquering Asia with the Korean Peninsula as a springboard just as the Japanese imperialists did in the past.  
					
					 But, the Japanese militarist forces are seriously mistaken.
					
					 The Korean people are no longer what used to be in the past when they had to shed bitter tears as members of a stateless nation after the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" and the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" were fabricated by the cruel Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Japan should give up its brigandish bid to grab Tok Islets.
					
					 This is a solemn warning served by the Korean people to the Japanese reactionaries who are making desperate efforts to stage a comeback to Korea like a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.

articles.title: Japanese Prime Minister's "Apology" for Past Crimes Termed Hypocritical
articles.content:
Japanese Prime Minister's "Apology" for Past Crimes Termed Hypocritical
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The present chief executive of Japan recently made public a statement in which he made an "apology" for Japan's past crimes on the lapse of the century since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty."
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The statement did not mention the issues of settlement and reparation for such hideous crimes against humanity as forcible drafting of Koreans and sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army committed by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 This "apology" was not an honest apology for the past crimes but a poor charade intended to calm down the public opinion at home and abroad critical of Japan's wrong attitude toward the settlement of its past.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that in the statement the Japanese chief executive made repentance and apology to south Korea only for Japan's past crimes. 
					
					 Japan's biased and wrong attitude toward its past crimes is evidently one more unpardonable crime against the DPRK and its people. Such wicked attitude only brings to bolder relief the brazen-faced nature and moral vulgarity peculiar to Japan.
					
					 Japan can never evade its obligation to make apology and reparation to the DPRK for its crime-woven past.
					
					 Nevertheless, ultra-right conservative forces of Japan are raising outcries over the prime minister's statement expressing "apology," making protests and the like. Meanwhile, right-wing media including Sankei Shimbun echoed their outcries, blustering that the prime minister's private view is unacceptable. This row cannot be construed otherwise than frenzy of political hysterics prompted by their black-hearted intention to totally deny Japan's past crime-woven history and evade the settlement of its past at any cost.
					
					 No matter what sleight of hand the Japanese reactionaries may employ to cover up the crime-woven history and dodge the settlement of the past this can never work in this bright world.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Make Early Reparation to Victims of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Make Early Reparation to Victims of Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Amnesty International released a statement on August 13, demanding that the Japanese government make early reparation to victims of the sexual slavery.
					 The statement recalled that the Japanese prime minister, in his statement issued on the lapse of a century since Japan fabricated the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" and illegally annexed Korea to it, did not mention the issue of comfort women at all. 
					
					 This is a grave act of denying the facts that the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was in force when Japan was invading all areas of Asia to turn them into its colonies, the statement said, and continued:
					
					  Japan has not paid any reparation to the victims. Amnesty International considers that such attitude of the Japanese government is only adding to its abuses of women's rights.
					
					 Growing stronger among many countries in the world and international organizations including the United Nations Human Rights Commission and even among people in Japan are the voices demanding reparation to the survivors of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Amnesty International demands that the Japanese government make early reparation to the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 The Japanese government should admit all legal responsibilities for the sufferings of the comfort women.
					
					 It should make an honest apology to the victims and make appropriate and substantial reparation to the survivors and their families.
					
					 It should make sure that textbooks properly deal with the sexual slavery enforced in World War II.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Lauded
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea jointly issued bulletin "Kim Jong Il and the 50th anniversary of Songun leadership" on August 24.
					 The bulletin said in an article that Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership is a main factor that enabled the DPRK, not a big country, to defend its sovereignty and dignity and win victory, firmly standing in confrontation with the U.S. styling itself the world's "only superpower." 
					
					 Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, thereby beginning his guidance to the military field before his guidance to the party work, the bulletin said, adding: His Songun leadership helped the DPRK defend its sovereignty and dignity and reliably ensure peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and thanks to his Songun politics the political and ideological might and military and technological capability of the KPA have been boosted in every way.
					
					 Referring to the fact his Songun leadership brought about a turning phase in Korea's reunification and remarkably raised the international position of the country, the bulletin extended highest glory to him for having trained the KPA into an invincible army and performed immortal exploits for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Praised
						
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- Political parties of Finland issued statements on August 21 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The Communist Workers' Party of Finland for the Peace and Socialism said in a statement that Kim Jong Il has provided wise Songun leadership over the Korean revolution for 50 years, adding that the Songun politics has become a basic political mode under socialism, displaying its great vitality in victoriously advancing the Korean revolution and establishing independence.
					
					 The party full supports the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il and expresses firm conviction that the Korean people will achieve only success in building a thriving nation, noted the statement.
					
					 The Finnish Communists' League in a statement extended invariable support and solidarity to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il and sincerely wished the Korean people success in their efforts to build a prosperous socialist state under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 Juzef Lachut, chairman of the National Executive Committee of the Polish Communist Party, in a statement on August 24 said that the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il is a fresh and unique political mode which is based on the Juche idea and consolidated and developed the principle of giving priority to military affairs, consistently maintained by President Kim Il Sung in the decades-long arduous revolutionary struggle, into a state leadership mode.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia exhibition took place in Russia, lectures in Italy, Sweden, Romania and Thailand and lectures, seminars, film shows and Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions in South Africa, Sweden, Bangladesh and Bulgaria in the period from August 20 to 24 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 On display in the venues of the functions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, books and photos dealing with their immortal exploits, photos showing the vitality of the Songun politics and handiworks representing the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Osvaldo Pesce, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Unified Communist Party of Italy, said in a lecture that Kim Jong Il has developed and enriched the Songun idea founded by the President from long ago to indicate the position held by Songun and role played by it in defending the sovereignty of the country and gains of socialism from the imperialists' aggression and advancing the human cause of independence, and led the Korean revolution to victory with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Eric Andersson, international secretary of the Communist Party in Sweden, noted in a lecture that under the banner of Songun the DPRK has steadily bolstered powerful military capacity enough to resolutely beat back any aggression.
					
					 Powerful war deterrent bolstered by dint of Songun is just a great contribution to the global peace, the feat of the DPRK, he stressed.
					
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, stated in a lecture that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, a landmark of Korea's reunification, and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing the joint declaration, were adopted and the international prestige of the DPRK has been remarkably raised under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event held in South Africa.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in France
Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Democrate Publishing House under the Anti-Imperialist Front of France on August 24.
					The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era as it inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the arms and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode which most correctly reflects the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also refers to the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, August 31 (KCNA) -- One day in May Juche 45 (1956) President Kim Il Sung visited the Pyongyang Textile Mill.
					 Going round the production processes, the President asked an official of the mill about the price per meter of textile.
					
					 The official informed him of the shop price.
					
					 The President said that the price was high and that it should be lowered one third in the future.
					
					 Giving ways of reducing the textile price, he said that the mill manager should run the mill in a responsible manner to systematically bring down the cost of production, making it possible to improve the people's livelihood.
					
					 Then the officials realized that the President visited the mill to discuss lowering the textile price along with increased cloth production so as to provide the people with more cloth.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe regalo de delegacion militar de China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe regalo de delegacion militar de China
Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio presente que le dedicara la delegacion de la zona militar de Shenyang del Ejercito Popular de Liberacion de China presidida por el teniente general Zhang Youxia, comandante de esta zona militar, de visita en Corea.
					El jefe de la delegacion lo entrego el dia 31 al vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares de Corea.

articles.title: Entidades y personas extranjeras apoyan politica de Songun de Corea
articles.content:
Entidades y personas extranjeras apoyan politica de Songun de Corea
 Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, los partidos politicos de Finlandia publicaron el dia 21 sendas declaraciones. 
					 El Partido Obrero Comunista para la Paz y el Socialismo de Finlandia senalo en su nota que durante 50 anos pasados, el Dirigente vino conduciendo sabiamente la revolucion coreana en virtud del Songun y agrego que esta politica manifiesta su gran vitalidad en el avance victorioso y el establecimiento de la independencia de la revolucion coreana sirviendo de principal modo politico del socialismo.
					
					 Expreso el apoyo total a la politica de Songun y la firme conviccion de que el pueblo coreano lograra siempre exitos en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera. 
					
					 La Liga de Comunistas de Finlandia expuso en su documento invariable apoyo y solidaridad con la politica de Songun y deseo de todo corazon exitos en la lucha del pueblo coreano por edificar una patria socialista prospera bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					 El presidente del Comite Ejecutivo Nacional del Partido Comunista de Polonia, Juzef Lachut, afirmo en su declaracion fechada 24 que la politica de Songun del Dirigente es el nuevo y original modo politico que se basa en la idea Juche, consolida y desarrolla como metodo de direccion estatal el principio de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares, el cual fue mantenido invariablemente por el Presidente Kim Il Sung en su ardua lucha revolucionaria de varios decenios.

articles.title: Inaugurada la central hidroelectrica no.6 de Ryesonggang
articles.content:
Inaugurada la central hidroelectrica no.6 de Ryesonggang
						
 Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada en una ceremonia realizada el dia 31 la Central Hidroelectrica no. 6 de Ryesonggang que contribuira al desarrollo economico del pais y la mejora de la vida del pueblo produciendo mucha energia electrica.
					 Ella fue construida magnificamente en un ano y pico por los funcionarios, los constructores y los miembros de la brigada de trabajo del distrito de Paechon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.

articles.title: Sesionado el 65o pleno del CC de la FGSC
articles.content:
Sesionado el 65o pleno del CC de la FGSC
						
 Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 31 en esta capital la 65a reunion plenaria del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea. 
					 En la ocasion, el presidente del CC de la FGSC, Kim Pyong Phal, fue depuesto por el problema de salud y fue electo Hyon Sang Ju como nuevo presidente.

articles.title: CJC publica carta blanca por centenario de tratado fraudulento
articles.content:
CJC publica carta blanca por centenario de tratado fraudulento
 Pyongyang, 31 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Comite de Juristas de Corea (CJC) hizo publica el dia 30 una carta blanca para revelar las maniobras criminales de los reaccionarios japoneses que rehusan liquidar sus multiples crimenes del pasado hablando de la "legalidad" del "Tratado de anexion de Corea a Japon" aunque paso ya un siglo desde que arrebataron completamente la soberania nacional de Corea inventando por la fuerza ese tratado.
					 La carta argumenta con datos que el caracter ilegal del "tratado" en cuestion reside en que fue fabricado de manera forzada por los imperialistas japoneses ignorando completamente la tramitacion de la firma de un tratado internacional.
					
					 El mandato imperial de Sunjong sobre la "anexion", promulgado el 29 de agosto de 1910, no conlleva la firma de puno y letra de este emperador, sino aparece solo en el su sello que se usaba para las gestiones administrativas. Al contrario, en el mandato del rey japones decretado el mismo dia se ven su sello y firma, senala la nota y continua:
					
					 La falta de la firma imperial en ese documento comprueba que el emperador coreano Sunjong no firmo ese "mandato imperial" oponiendose a los imperialistas japoneses que pretendian apoderarse de Corea.
					
					 Todos los hechos demuestran que el "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon", que puede ser inventado solo por los gangsteres japoneses, es un documento fraudulento ilegitimo e invalido que no satisface ni los elementales requisitos de un tratado internacional. 
					
					 Hasta la fecha en que se cumple el centenario de la invencion de este "tratado", los gobiernos sucesivos y los politiqueros conservadores reaccionarios de Japon niegan su caracter ilegal pronunciando sofismas de toda indole para atribuirle la "legalidad".
					
					 En cuanto a ese "tratado", Japon mantiene hasta la fecha la actitud y el punto de visita de que ese documento fue concertado legalmente en aquel entonces y por lo tanto, no tiene ninguna responsabilidad legal de la dominacion colonial de Corea.
					
					 Si los reaccionarios japoneses reconocen la historia de crimenes del pasado, se veran obligados a comprometerse ante la sociedad internacional a no repetirla. 
					
					 Esto no les conviene en ningun caso porque les significaria buscarse la traba que les impide lanzar la nueva agresion. 
					
					  La otra razon por la cual las autoridades japonesas no reconocen su historia criminal de agresiones y saqueo reside en eludir la responsabilidad legal de la indemnizacion. 
					
					 Si Japon, siendo un miembro de la sociedad internacional, evade su responsabilidad legal y deber por los archi-crimenes de lesa humanidad cometidos en el pasado por los imperialistas japoneses, revelara por si solo a la faz del mundo que es un Estado ilegal.
					
					 Hacer a Japon reconocer la historia de crimenes e indemnizarlos no es un problema especifico entre Corea y Japon, sino es una tarea comun de todos los paises y pueblos que fueron agredidos por este pais isleno y sufrieron muchas perdidas.
					
					  Reconociendo que la liquidacion del pasado criminal de Japon no es un simple problema entre este y los paises victimas, sino un problema relacionado con la paz y la seguridad del mundo y para defender la justicia y el principio de la ley internacional, el Comite de Juristas de Corea desplegara con mas dinamismo junto con los pueblos pacifistas, las entidades juridicas y los juristas progresistas de Asia y el resto del mundo la justa lucha por saldar la cuenta de los crimenes del pasado del pais isleno.
